DataElement.preferredName: Barthel Index Past 24 to 48 Hours Mobility Score 4 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: An observation of a person's ability  to move about the house or indoors over the preceding 24-48 hours, using a 4 point scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Barthel Index Past 24 to 48 Hours Mobility Ability Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A clinical assessment tool designed to measure functional independence and need for assistance in mobility, self-care, and activities of daily living._The 24-48 hour period occurring just before the present time._A question about an individual's ability to move about the house or indoors._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Barthel Index of Activities of Daily Living
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A clinical assessment tool designed to measure functional independence and need for assistance in mobility, self-care, and activities of daily living.

Concepts.longName: Barthel Index of Activities of Daily Living
Concepts.definition: A clinical assessment tool designed to measure functional independence and need for assistance in mobility, self-care, and activities of daily living.

Property.preferredName: Past 24 to 48 Hours Mobility Ability Score
Property.preferredDefinition: The 24-48 hour period occurring just before the present time.:A question about an individual's ability to move about the house or indoors.:A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.definition: The 24-48 hour period occurring just before the present time.
A question about an individual's ability to move about the house or indoors.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

DataElementConcept.origin: Barthel Index:Barthel Index of Activities of Daily Living. Collin et al., 1988

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: independent (but may use any aid; for example, stick) > 50 yards

ValueMeaning.preferredName: independent (but may use any aid; for example, stick) > 50 yards
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual is independently mobile but may use any aid and can move more than 50 yards.

Concepts.longName: Mobility Independent But May Use Any Aid, Greater Than 50 Yards
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual is independently mobile but may use any aid and can move more than 50 yards.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: walks with help of one person (verbal or physical) > 50 yards

ValueMeaning.preferredName: walks with help of one person (verbal or physical) > 50 yards
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual can walk with verbal or physical help of one person and can move more than 50 yards.

Concepts.longName: Walks with Help of One Person, Greater Than 50 Yards
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual can walk with verbal or physical help of one person and can move more than 50 yards.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual is independent with use of a wheelchair, including corners, and can move more than 50 yards.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual is independent with use of a wheelchair, including corners, and can move more than 50 yards.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual is immobile or can move less than 50 yards.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual is immobile or can move less than 50 yards.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

Concepts.definition: An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes.

ValueDomain.origin: Barthel Index:Barthel Index of Activities of Daily Living. Collin et al., 1988
ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created for Alliance study in Rave. mc 4.12.19

ClassificationSchemes.longName: Barthel Index (Barthel Index of Activities of Daily Living)

DataElement.origin: Barthel Index:Barthel Index of Activities of Daily Living. Collin et al., 1988
